title: "New solution based on deep learning classifies epileptic events in near real-time"
excerpt: "In this context, a team of researchers from INESC TEC, in Portugal, and from the Neurology Department of Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich, tested a solution based on deep learning to classify epileptic events, using an infrared radar and 3D videos."
